<Heading as={"h1"} className={"openapi__heading"} children={"删除项目"} />

<MethodEndpoint method={"post"} path={"/projects/{project_id}/delete"} context={"endpoint"} />

删除一个项目。删除项目的同时也会删除该项目下的所有部署。

<Heading id={"request"} as={"h2"} className={"openapi-tabs__heading"} children={"请求"} />

<ParamsDetails parameters={[{"name":"project_id","in":"path","description":"项目 ID","required":true,"schema":{"type":"integer","format":"int64","minimum":0,"title":"ProjectId"}}]} />

<RequestSchema title={"请求体"} body={undefined} />

<StatusCodes id={undefined} label={undefined} responses={{"200":{"description":""}}} />
